title: Information Literacy-Integrated Modular Education for Engineering-Based Social Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Hybrid environment combining smartphone-based offline activities and online resource distribution. Strengthens information collection/analysis/application skills while applying engineering knowledge to social problem-solving.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and evaluate three or more credible information sources to address social issues in engineering fields
Learners can concretely propose solutions integrating engineering concepts and information literacy using modular learning materials
Learners can write engineering-based social problem-solving reports based on information collected in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
